title: Typography Batman HELP!
content:
Hello, I would like knowing that type of typography has the cartel of batman The dark night rise, I put the link of the image so that you could see it, thank you very much, and if know you the one who created the cartel would be very grateful!

[http://media.ign.com/games/image/object/961/961205/dark-knight-rises\_Pos...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180531/http:/media.ign.com/games/image/object/961/961205/dark-knight-rises_Poster-2012ver.jpg "http://media.ign.com/games/image/object/961/961205/dark-knight-rises\_Poster-2012ver.jpg")
author: soraman9

comments.content: Please post Type ID requests in the forum called [Font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180531/http:/typophile.com/typeid).
